dict.acceptation: 信誉，信用；[金融]贷款；荣誉；学分；
相信，信任；归功于；[会]记入贷方；赞颂；

sent.orig: Why don't I have any credit?
sent.trans: 为什么我一点积分(credit)都没有？

sent.orig: But the basics of credit-risk management have been reinforced rather than overturned.
sent.trans: 但信用风险管理(credit-riskmanagement)的基础不仅未被颠覆，反而得到了加强。

sent.orig: Credit repair is professional credIt'services, its responsibilities by credit institutions and credit practice staff.
sent.trans: 信用修复属于专业信用服务，其责任由信用机构和信用执业人员承担。

sent.orig: CredIt'services include: hsiang assessment, good credit company recommended, credit-related legal advice.
sent.trans: 徵信服务包括：徵信社评定、优良徵信公司推荐、徵信相关法律谘询。

sent.orig: Remittance and collection belong to commercial credit. Letter of credit belongs to banker's credit.
sent.trans: 汇付和托收属于商业信用，信用证属于银行信用。
